ciso_ci_tammany_hall_creation_trigger_sgui = {
	scope = state
	is_shown = {
		NOT = {
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = ciso_civil_institutions
				target = flag:ciso_ci_tammany_hall
			}
		}
		state_region = s:STATE_NEW_YORK
	}
	is_valid = {
		ciso_ci_tammany_hall_creation_trigger = yes
	}
}
